desc: Welcome to Cat and Crone, where we ignite your inner witch with our monthly subscription boxes designed to inspire, expand and delight your witchly senses.

layout.text:
***Additional August Boxes Available in Past Boxes***
Due to personal circumstance, we are suspending our subscription box service. As long as we can, we will be fulfilling items from the Marketplace.
If you are a current subscriber, please look in your email for explanation.
THANK YOU ALL FOR A TREMENDOUS LAUNCH - I HOPE TO RETURN SOON!
